ProductInfo.Features:
Existing Clients: Disney, Universal Studios, The U.S. Army, NASA, Kennedy Space Center, Sea World, CBS and many more.
Worlds Thinnest Outdoor TV!  Measures 1.5" Deep.
Smart TV with Built-in WiFi & Apps.  Made for Direct Sunlight.  TV's Custom Altered for Outdoor Use.  Resistant to rain, dust, insects, etc.  Temperature Range: -25 to 145 degrees F
The Brightest Outdoor TV's on the market!  16.7 million colors, TFT Active Matrix Liquid Crystal with Enhanced Brightness LED Backlight Modulation Technology.  40% Less Energy, Higher Contrast, No Mercury Components.
100% Guaranteed
ProductInfo.Name: The World's Thinnest Smart Outdoor LED TV With Built-in WiFi & Apps. The D Series 40" Outdoor LED HD TV
